attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
British Politics has had nothing but a negative effect on all the Nations peoples within Britain for far too long now, so it is about time we scapped the current political system all together! and started a fresh with a more public friendly system, where there are far less laws and red tape, with a public voting/decision making system, with no political parties, where the people vote on decisions which effect themselves, their families, friends and neighbourhoods, their Cities, Towns and States.
No more political parties abusing the public.
This way the public will run their own Nations and not MP's.
England, Northern Ireland, Wales and Scotland will be ran by the people for the people.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
